title: Why Girls Are Weird
description: Bored with her job in a high-school library, angry over being dumped, and yearning for a little excitement, Anna Koval decides to publish the stories of her life online and begins to dream up all kinds of wonderful things for her personal diary, but things begin to backfire when her online journal begins to attract some all-too-adoring fans. Original.
author: Pamela Ribon
